catalog_info.title: Intermediate Hindi-Urdu
catalog_info.notes: Not open to auditors; cannot be taken Pass/Fail.
catalog_info.description: Continuation of Hindi-Urdu 101. Emphasis on written expression and texts in both Perso-Arabic and Devanagari script systems. Students are introduced to Hindi-Urdu fables, short stories, and various other genres of literature, including poetry. Students must complete both terms of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit.
